The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely related to an unseen pre-historic danger, be it hostile paleo aquatic creatures or human predators.
They experience kidnappings and disappearances as well as sabotage and jeopardizing of their exploration efforts by night. Stuttering Elias van Lill investigates this

While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent economy. In the end, Jerry MEA Culpa puts Tom into a ball ornament after getting busy with his new sweetheart. Tom wants revenge for causing him so much grief.
The wild times here are two old codgers who should be free of tensions of life while sucking on their beer

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back again to watch it.
I was hoping for a Metal version of music when I listened to a preview cover from Wolf Brother. I wasn’t disappointed but also not surprised enough.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures across the Universe in their space ships.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping what seems to be an organized criminal outfit might seem simple enough ; but once you've seen Michael reject flying bullets and avoid being hacked apart by ninjas with swords ,you should have your expectations lowered accordingly. If you suspend realism,it's fairly enjoyable .<|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|><|end_of_text|>
